p: The effect of marjoram EO, chitosan, and AA application on hydrogen peroxide and lipid peroxidation is illustrated in Figure 7. Increased H 2O 2 levels were reported in case of marjoram EO, AA, and EO+AA applications on the second and fourth day of storage. During the last day of storage, the application of AA, Chitosan+AA, and chlorine led to lower H 2O 2 levels, while EO application showed a higher value ( Figure 7A).
